verses.verse: מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָוִ֑ד <WH1732> of David יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> The LORD רֹ֝עִ֗י <WH7462> [is] my shepherd לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not אֶחְסָֽר׃ <WH2637> I shall not want

בִּנְא֣וֹת <WH4999> pastures דֶּ֭שֶׁא <WH1877> in green יַרְבִּיצֵ֑נִי <WH7257> He maketh me to lie down עַל־ <WH5921> beside מֵ֖י <WH4325> waters מְנֻח֣וֹת <WH4496> me beside the still יְנַהֲלֵֽנִי׃ <WH5095> he leadeth

נַפְשִׁ֥י <WH5315> my soul יְשׁוֹבֵ֑ב <WH7725> He restoreth יַֽנְחֵ֥נִי <WH5148> he leadeth בְמַעְגְּלֵי־ <WH4570> me in the paths צֶ֝֗דֶק <WH6664> of righteousness לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> sake שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> for his name's

גַּ֤ם <WH1571> Even כִּֽי־ <WH3588> though אֵלֵ֨ךְ <WH1980> walk בְּגֵ֪יא <WH1516> through the valley צַלְמָ֡וֶת <WH6757> of the shadow of death לֹא־ <WH3808> no אִ֘ירָ֤א <WH3372> I will fear רָ֗ע <WH7451> no evil כִּי־ <WH3588> though אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you עִמָּדִ֑י <WH5978> me שִׁבְטְךָ֥ <WH7626> for thou [art] with me thy rod וּ֝מִשְׁעַנְתֶּ֗ךָ <WH4938> and thy staff הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> they יְנַֽחֲמֻֽנִי׃ <WH5162> they comfort

תַּעֲרֹ֬ךְ <WH6186> Thou preparest לְפָנַ֨י ׀ <WH6440> before שֻׁלְחָ֗ן <WH7979> a table נֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> the presence צֹרְרָ֑י <WH6887> me in the presence of mine enemies דִּשַּׁ֖נְתָּ <WH1878> thou anointest בַשֶּׁ֥מֶן <WH8081> with oil רֹ֝אשִׁ֗י <WH7218> my head כּוֹסִ֥י <WH3563> my cup רְוָיָֽה׃ <WH7310> runneth over

אַ֤ךְ ׀ <WH389> Surely ט֤וֹב <WH2896> Surely goodness וָחֶ֣סֶד <WH2617> and mercy יִ֭רְדְּפוּנִי <WH7291> shall follow כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> me all the days חַיָּ֑י <WH2416> of my life וְשַׁבְתִּ֥י <WH3427> and I will dwell בְּבֵית־ <WH1004> in the house יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְאֹ֣רֶךְ <WH753> forever יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> the days
